Topic.Title: City Art Centre has its first 3 Games up

Posts.EditableText:
There are several City Art Centres in the world. And more than one is in Canada. One of those is in London, Ontario. That's us.
And we have created and published three games in memory of an earlier incarnation of our own City Art Centre.
They are: a tiny art work called Cross the Park, and two open creative adventures, Upstairs Poetry and Upstairs Puzzle.
I hope that many people will come check out our Quest text adventures.

https://textadventures.co.uk/user/view/__wbnf6muuusjnva-bs8xg/city-art-centre

There are several City Art Centres in the world. And more than one is in Canada. One of those is in London, Ontario. That's us.
And we have created and published three games in memory of an earlier incarnation of our own City Art Centre.
They are: a tiny art work called Cross the Park, and two open creative adventures, Upstairs Poetry and Upstairs Puzzle.
I hope that many people will come check out our Quest text adventures.
